title: ByteDance, Brookfield Courted by Voltalia for Brazil Data Parks
description: French renewable energy provider Voltalia SA is pursuing data center projects in Brazil with investors including TikTok owner ByteDance Co Ltd. and private equity powerhouse Brookfield Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.
